titleStmt.title: Sir Charles Lucas his last speech at the place of execution, where hee was shot to death.
titleStmt.author: Lucas, Charles, Sir, 1613-1648.
Coke, Roger, fl. 1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Smithurst, neer Pye-corner,

notesStmt.note: Also includes "A speech made by C.R. one of the Lord Generalls officers, in answer to Sir Charles Lucas his first speech" and "A second speech, spoken by a private souldier".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
